    • onCreateDialog

      @NonNull public android.app.Dialog onCreateDialog(@Nullable android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Function encapsulates the logic behind all components in the EditItemFragment that will show up as a dialogue. It is executed when the Fragment pops up
      Overrides:
      onCreateDialog in class androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
      Parameters:
      savedInstanceState - If the fragment is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in DialogFragment.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle). Note: Otherwise it is null.
